name: CalmMyCat
0:
”Alexa, open Calm My Cat”
”Alexa, start Calm My Cat”
”Alexa, play Calm My Cat”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: calm my cat
Developer Terms of Use
des:
CALM MY CAT
Since you can't be with your cat all of the time this skill provides relaxing music especially chosen to calm and keep your cat company. This specially mixed slow tempo music can reduce stress and have a positive effect on cats. The calming simple music will play whilst you are out, or until you choose to stop.

HOW TO USE
Before first use, enable the skill by pressing the Enable button in the Skill Store, then say "Alexa, open Calm My Cat" to begin.

To finish, say "Alexa, stop".

PREMIUM VERSION
The Premium version allows you to treat your cat to an enhanced calming experience with the following added features: 
+ Premium sound quality
+ Enhanced looping (every 3 hours instead of every 1 hour) for increased variety.
It allows your cat to remain relaxed for longer and provides company whilst you are away.

FEEDBACK
Connect with us at http://www.hero-software.co.uk
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
